title: Define Project Scope and Requirements - v2.0
description: Revised document detailing the project requirements, including desired features, user personas, expected outcomes, data sources, integrations, security considerations (including privacy concerns), scalability and performance requirements, edge cases or exceptions, guidelines for API design where applicable, accessibility considerations, usability, and user experience. This document aims to provide a clear understanding of the project's scope, guiding development decisions throughout the project lifecycle. The revised version focuses more on clarity and brevity, ensuring that each requirement is concise yet detailed.

title: Design System Architecture - AI-driven Onboarding Personalization System (Revised)
description: This RFC proposes the design of a comprehensive system architecture for the AI-driven Onboarding Personalization System, encompassing frontend and backend components, data flow, integration points, and key considerations such as scalability, maintainability, performance, modularity, extensibility, and reusability. The design focuses on future flexibility by choosing appropriate AI libraries, discussing their potential impact on system performance, and outlining the necessary modules for role-based personalization, adaptive learning, and seamless user interface integration. The chosen architecture will ensure a scalable, efficient, and robust solution for creating personalized onboarding experiences based on employees' roles, backgrounds, and learning styles.

title: Develop User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for the onboarding experience, ensuring a seamless and intuitive experience.

title: Implement AI-driven Personalization
description: Develop the AI algorithms and models responsible for personalizing the onboarding experience based on user data.

title: Set up Data Storage and Management
description: Design and implement the data storage and management system for user data, onboarding content, and personalization models.

title: Implement Integration and API
description: Develop the necessary APIs and integration points for the system to communicate with other systems and data sources.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Configure the continuous integration and deployment pipeline for the project, ensuring smooth and automated deployments.

title: Implement Security and Compliance
description: Ensure the system adheres to security best practices and complies with relevant regulations and standards.

title: Create Test Suite and QA Process
description: Develop a comprehensive test suite and quality assurance process to ensure the system's functionality and reliability.

title: Write Technical Documentation
description: Document the system's architecture, components, and APIs for future reference and maintenance.
